Come on. Try and catch me!
Marco!

I don't care if dinosaurs die, you know? I thought they were dead.

I'm on set joined by the amazing cast of Cliff Beasts 6.

every day is an opportunity for, uh…

And, uh, you know, that's all I got.

I'm not.

Krystal Kris, the most selfish TikTok superstar in the world,

translation.es: se verá en televisión y seré actor de televisión.

translation.en: I'm not a television star! I am a movie star! What do you think I am? Young Sheldon?
translation.es: No hago televisión. ¡Soy estrella de cine! ¿Creen que soy Sheldon de niño?

translation.en: - No, don't leave me! - Let go!
Not now. Turn that off, you tit!
Yeah, the cast all called me EPK Guy.
translation.es: Sí, el equipo me llamaba EPK.

translation.en: It's like, That's not my name. My name is Scott.
translation.es: Y yo les decía: No me llamo así. Me llamo Scott.

translation.en: Now they know it. It's on the fucking poster.
translation.es: Ahora lo saben. Sale en el afiche.

translation.en: How does it feel to be the villain of Beasts of the Bubble?

translation.en: I'm not the villain. What are you talking about?
Why are you complaining? I can't leave and have almost no lines.

translation.en: I'm over here with my dick in my hands like a piece- of- shit extra!
translation.es: Estoy indefensa como si fuera una extra de mierda.

translation.en: No, I didn't know that all my Zoom calls were being recorded.
translation.es: No sabía que habían grabado todas mis llamadas de Zoom.

translation.en: I could sue, but I won't 'cause I'm in on the joke, and I love the joke.
translation.es: No voy a demandarlos. Soy parte del chiste y me encanta.

translation.en: So you're the mole!
I know! I'm the mole.
I never thought it could work as just a hand.
translation.es: No creí que funcionara igual que una mano.

translation.en: High five.
See?
Sean, how are you doing?
I heard you just got out of rehab for cocaine addiction.
translation.es: Supe que fuiste a rehabilitación por adicción a la cocaína.

translation.en: Yes, two- day rehab. I walked in one day. I said, I think I'm addicted to cocaine.
translation.es: Sí, dos días. Entré un día y dije: Soy adicto a la cocaína.

translation.en: They said, You shouldn't do that anymore. I said, Done.
translation.es: Dijeron: Ya no consumas. Y dije: Se acabó.

translation.en: - Two days, huh? - 48 hours.
What's your next project, Darren? I'm doing the Skittles movie.
translation.es: - ¿Tu próximo proyecto? - La película de Skittles.

translation.en: It's based on the candy. It's got a great story. A passion project.
translation.es: Se basa en los dulces. Es una gran historia. Me apasiona.

translation.en: And it's about racism and diversity, and how we can all get along.
translation.es: Habla del racismo y de la diversidad y de cómo podemos congeniar.

translation.en: It's all the flavors, but it all goes under one name. Skittles.
translation.es: Todos los sabores bajo un solo nombre: Skittles.

translation.en: So much exciting news for the two of you. And who's this?
translation.es: Buenas noticias para los dos. ¿Quién es ella?

translation.en: This is our friend, Kate.
I have no idea why I'm here.
translation.es: No tengo idea de por qué estoy aquí.

translation.en: Come on, Kate.
Come on.
I'm a beast!
- Come on, Rafi, just say it with me. - No, get off me!
translation.es: - Vamos, Rafi, dilo conmigo. - No, suéltame.

translation.en: So how have you been doing since the movie?
Um, yeah, good.
Um, so I'm worried I'm gonna get in trouble
because I didn't send the swabs off to get tested.
translation.es: porque no envié los hisopos a analizar.

translation.en: Um, so I've still got most of them at home.
And even now I don't really know where to send them. If you know?
No? Thank you.
Do you think they have enough footage in the can to put a cut together?

translation.en: We didn't get any of the opening,
but maybe that doesn't matter as long as the ending's strong.
translation.es: pero si el final es sólido, no importa.

translation.en: Yeah. The rest of the movie can be shit as long as the ending's good
translation.es: La película puede ser una mierda, pero si el final es bueno, es lo único que recordarán.

translation.en: 'cause that's what they'll remember. You know?
translation.es: pero si el final es bueno, es lo único que recordarán.

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Well, at least we tried to make a movie. They can't judge us for that.
translation.es: Al menos intentamos hacer una película. No pueden juzgarnos por eso.

translation.en: We made something that's a distraction in these difficult times.
translation.es: Les dimos una distracción en estos momentos difíciles.

translation.en: It's really hard to direct in these things.
